description:
Upward Mobility's Social Work Licensure Board exam prep app for Palm webOS is our exclusive study app designed for the content on the ASWB Bachelors Level Social Work Licensing Exam.    
||  
Our app contains 306 simulated exam questions with detailed explanations. All of our material is written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who are licensed social workers, and undergo a rigorous review process. Our Social Wok Exam Prep app is designed to cover the need-to-know information necessary for a BSW with no post-degree experience who is preparing for the Social Work Board exam. 
  ||  
We include the following topics: 
Human Developing & Behavior in the Environment 
Issues of Diversity 
Assessment in Social Work Practice 
Direct and Indirect Practice 
Communication 
Professional Relationships 
Professional Values and Ethics 
Supervision in Social Work 
Practice Evaluation and the Utilization of Research 
Service Delivery 
Social Work Administration 
  ||  
Upward Mobility is not affiliated with nor is this app endorsed by the ASWB.
  ||  
Upward Mobility's intuitive user interface provides users with two useful modes. In Study Mode users can methodically review questions and see their explanations, as well as track their progress. Test Mode simulates a exam, allowing users to choose number of questions and the time limit, as well as save an in-progress exam and review their answers question-by-question when they are done. 
  ||  
 Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
